divs: sighting detailsif you go to this link and enlarge the picture and look to the farthest easterly side of the page (the right side), and look about 10 degrees above the horizon, you will see a metalic object hovering just about ten degrees the mars surface. this picture by the way comes directly off the mars exploration rover website run by nasa. the ufo http:\\marsrovers.jpl.nasa.gov\spotlight\20081120_opportunity\20081120_opp_3.jpg mars rover website http:\\marsrovers.jpl.nasa.gov\spotlight\20081120_opportunity.html
